title: FS/FT - T206 Tinker - Hands on Knees & Chance Red Port.
author: Rascal1010

posts.post_title: FS/FT - T206 Tinker - Hands on Knees & Chance Red Port.
posts.post_content:
These two have been upgraded in my collection and it's time for them to find a new home.  Both are relatively tough front back combinations, and both present very well for the PSA 3 grades assigned to them.  Shipping is on me and will be Priority Mail in padded envelope. Prefer payment via Paypal F/F.  PM me if interested in one or both of these Cub HOFer's.

T206 Tinker - Hands on Knees - Sovereign 350 - TRADED

T206 Chance - Red Portrait - Sweet Caporal 350/25 - SOLD

Thanks,
Steve
Tinker has been traded, so Chance Red Portrait only one left!
